 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.jhove2.module.format.xml

Class Summary
CommentInformation A class to hold a list of comment strings.
DTD This class is used to hold information about a document scope declaration discovered during parsing of an XML instance.
Entity This class is used to hold information about an entity declaration discovered during parsing of an XML instance.
EntityReference A nested class to contain a single entity name and the count of its references in the XML document
EntityReferences A class to hold a sorted set of entity names and counts of how many times an entity reference was found in the XML document.
Namespace This class is used to hold information about a namespace declaration discovered during parsing of an XML instance.
NamespaceDeclaration A nested class to hold information about the declaration for a namespace.
NamespaceInformation The XML namespace mechanism provide a simple method for qualifying element and attribute names by associating them with unique URI references.
Notation This class is used to hold information about a notation declaration discovered during parsing of an XML instance.
NumericCharacterReference A nested class to contain a single NCR code point and the count of its occurrences
NumericCharacterReferenceInformation A class to hold a sorted set of numeric character references (NCRs) that are used to represent Unicode characters, and the counts of how many times each NCR reference was found in the XML document.
ProcessingInstruction This class is used to hold information about a processing instruction discovered during parsing of an XML instance.
RootElement This class is used to hold information about the root element discovered during parsing of an XML instance.
SaxParser This class provides an wrapper for methods used to create and initialize the SAX2 parser used to characterize an XML instance.
SaxParserContentHandler An instance of this class is registered with the SAX parser to handle events related to the XML document's content, such as start and end of the document, start and end of an element, character data, and processing instructions that are encountered.
SaxParserDeclHandler An instance of this class is registered with the SAX parser to handle events related to the XML document's DTD declarations.
SaxParserDtdHandler An instance of this class is registered with the SAX parser to handle events related to the XML document's DTD declarations.
SaxParserErrorHandler An instance of this class is registered with the SAX parser to handle events related to errors or warnings that occur during the parsing of the XML document.
SaxParserLexicalHandler An instance of this class is registered with the SAX parser to handle events related to the lexical information about an XML document.
SchemaLocation A class to hold SchemaLocation information for a namespace.
ValidationMessage A data structure to hold a single parser exception message.
ValidationMessageList A data structure to hold the list of messages of a specific message scope.
ValidationResults A data structure to hold warning and error messages captured during XML validation.
XmlDeclaration This class is used to hold information about an XML declaration discovered during parsing of an XML instance.
XmlModule JHOVE2 XML module.
 

Enum Summary
Entity.EntityType An enumeration of entity types.
